statements: SELECT * FROM crm_third_party_integration;
SELECT id, app_name FROM crm_third_party_integration;
SELECT app_name, connection_type FROM crm_third_party_integration;
SELECT * FROM crm_third_party_integration WHERE id = 1;
SELECT id, app_name FROM crm_third_party_integration WHERE synchronization_frequency > 5;
SELECT * FROM crm_third_party_integration WHERE connection_type = 'API';
SELECT app_name, synchronization_frequency FROM crm_third_party_integration WHERE last_sync_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT id, connection_type FROM crm_third_party_integration WHERE synchronization_frequency < 10;
SELECT * FROM crm_third_party_integration WHERE last_sync_date IS NULL;
SELECT id, app_name, synchronization_frequency FROM crm_third_party_integration WHERE connection_type = 'Webhook';
SELECT * FROM crm_third_party_integration ORDER BY synchronization_frequency DESC;
SELECT app_name, last_sync_date FROM crm_third_party_integration ORDER BY last_sync_date ASC;
SELECT id, app_name, last_sync_date FROM crm_third_party_integration ORDER BY id;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM crm_third_party_integration;
SELECT MAX(synchronization_frequency) FROM crm_third_party_integration;
SELECT AVG(synchronization_frequency) FROM crm_third_party_integration;
SELECT MIN(last_sync_date) FROM crm_third_party_integration;
SELECT * FROM crm_third_party_integration LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM crm_third_party_integration OFFSET 3;
SELECT DISTINCT connection_type FROM crm_third_party_integration;
SELECT id, app_name FROM crm_third_party_integration WHERE synchronization_frequency > 5;
SELECT * FROM crm_third_party_integration WHERE connection_type = 'REST API' AND last_sync_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT app_name, connection_type, synchronization_frequency FROM crm_third_party_integration WHERE id = 10;
SELECT id, synchronization_frequency FROM crm_third_party_integration WHERE app_name LIKE 'App%';
SELECT * FROM crm_third_party_integration WHERE last_sync_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT id, app_name FROM crm_third_party_integration WHERE connection_type IN ('SOAP API', 'GraphQL');
SELECT COUNT(id) AS total_apps FROM crm_third_party_integration WHERE synchronization_frequency >= 10;
SELECT id, app_name FROM crm_third_party_integration ORDER BY synchronization_frequency DESC;
SELECT app_name, COUNT(*) AS total_records FROM crm_third_party_integration GROUP BY app_name;
SELECT id, app_name, connection_type FROM crm_third_party_integration WHERE synchronization_frequency > (SELECT MAX(synchronization_frequency) FROM crm_third_party_integration);
SELECT AVG(synchronization_frequency) AS avg_freq FROM crm_third_party_integration;
SELECT connection_type, MAX(synchronization_frequency) AS max_freq FROM crm_third_party_integration GROUP BY connection_type;
SELECT id, app_name, synchronization_frequency FROM crm_third_party_integration WHERE last_sync_date IS NULL;
SELECT * FROM crm_third_party_integration WHERE id BETWEEN 5 AND 10;
SELECT id, app_name, synchronization_frequency FROM crm_third_party_integration WHERE app_name = 'Integration App' AND connection_type = 'Webhook';
SELECT id, app_name, synchronization_frequency FROM crm_third_party_integration WHERE last_sync_date = (SELECT MAX(last_sync_date) FROM crm_third_party_integration);
SELECT id, app_name, connection_type FROM crm_third_party_integration WHERE synchronization_frequency >= 5 OR last_sync_date > '2022-06-01';
SELECT DISTINCT connection_type FROM crm_third_party_integration;
SELECT id, app_name FROM crm_third_party_integration WHERE synchronization_frequency < (SELECT AVG(synchronization_frequency) FROM crm_third_party_integration);
SELECT id, app_name, last_sync_date FROM crm_third_party_integration WHERE DATEDIFF(CURDATE(), last_sync_date) > 30;
SELECT * FROM ThirdPartyApplications;
SELECT app_name, connection_string FROM ThirdPartyApplications WHERE sync_interval > '1 day';
SELECT id, sync_interval FROM ThirdPartyApplications WHERE app_name = 'ExampleApp';
SELECT * FROM CRMData;
SELECT data_category, data_value FROM CRMData WHERE last_sync > '2022-01-01';
SELECT entry_id, data_value FROM CRMData WHERE data_category = 'Customer';
SELECT id, app_name, connection_string, sync_interval FROM ThirdPartyApplications WHERE id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM CRMData WHERE entry_id = 'abcdef12-3456-7890-cdef-1234567890ab';
SELECT * FROM ThirdPartyApplications WHERE sync_interval > '1 hour';
SELECT app_name, sync_interval FROM ThirdPartyApplications WHERE id = '09876543-21dc-ba98-7654-3210fedcba09';
SELECT id, app_name, connection_string FROM ThirdPartyApplications WHERE sync_interval = '30 minutes';
SELECT * FROM CRMData WHERE last_sync > '2021-01-01';
SELECT data_category, data_value, last_sync FROM CRMData WHERE data_category = 'Order';
SELECT entry_id, last_sync FROM CRMData WHERE last_sync < '2022-03-01';
SELECT id, app_name, connection_string FROM ThirdPartyApplications WHERE id = '543210ab-cdef-7890-1234-567890abcdef';
SELECT * FROM CRMData WHERE data_category = 'Product';
SELECT entry_id, last_sync FROM CRMData WHERE last_sync < '2021-10-01';
SELECT id, app_name FROM ThirdPartyApplications WHERE sync_interval = '1 week';
SELECT * FROM ThirdPartyApplications WHERE id = 'abcdef12-3456-7890-cdef-1234567890ab';
SELECT data_category, data_value FROM CRMData WHERE last_sync <= '2022-04-01';
SELECT * FROM ThirdPartyApplications;
SELECT app_name, connection_string FROM ThirdPartyApplications WHERE sync_interval > '1 week';
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ThirdPartyApplications;
SELECT * FROM CRMData WHERE data_category='customer';
SELECT data_value FROM CRMData WHERE last_sync < '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM ThirdPartyApplications WHERE sync_interval < '24 hours';
SELECT app_name, sync_interval FROM ThirdPartyApplications ORDER BY sync_interval DESC;
SELECT entry_id, data_value FROM CRMData WHERE last_sync BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM CRMData WHERE data_category='product';
SELECT app_name, connection_string FROM ThirdPartyApplications WHERE sync_interval < '30 days' AND app_name LIKE 'App%';
SELECT * FROM ThirdPartyApplications WHERE sync_interval < '1 hour' AND connection_string LIKE '%production%';
SELECT DISTINCT data_category FROM CRMData;
SELECT app_name, connection_string, sync_interval FROM ThirdPartyApplications WHERE app_name='App1' OR app_name='App2';
SELECT AVG(sync_interval) FROM ThirdPartyApplications;
SELECT MAX(last_sync) FROM CRMData WHERE data_category='order';
SELECT app_name, connection_string, sync_interval FROM ThirdPartyApplications WHERE sync_interval = '1 day' OR sync_interval = '3 days';
SELECT * FROM ThirdPartyApplications WHERE connection_string ILIKE '%development%' AND sync_interval > '1 hour';
SELECT data_category, COUNT(*) FROM CRMData GROUP BY data_category;
SELECT app_name, connection_string FROM ThirdPartyApplications WHERE sync_interval = '1 week' AND app_name NOT LIKE 'Dev%';
SELECT * FROM CRMData WHERE last_sync > NOW() - INTERVAL '1 month';
SELECT * FROM ThirdPartyApplications;
SELECT app_name, app_description FROM ThirdPartyApplications;
SELECT app_id, app_name, crm_api_key FROM ThirdPartyApplications WHERE app_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT * FROM CRMData;
SELECT customer_id, data_field, data_value FROM CRMData WHERE data_field = 'email';
SELECT record_id, data_field, data_value FROM CRMData WHERE customer_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM DataIntegrationLogs;
SELECT integration_type, status FROM DataIntegrationLogs WHERE status = 'failed';
SELECT log_id, integration_type, error_message FROM DataIntegrationLogs WHERE status = 'failed';
SELECT * FROM ThirdPartyApplications WHERE app_name ILIKE '%software%';
SELECT * FROM CRMData WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM DataIntegrationLogs WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT app_id, app_name, crm_api_key FROM ThirdPartyApplications ORDER BY app_name ASC;
SELECT log_id, status, integration_type FROM DataIntegrationLogs WHERE status = 'pending' ORDER BY log_id DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT integration_type FROM DataIntegrationLogs;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ThirdPartyApplications;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM CRMData WHERE customer_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT AVG(record_id) FROM CRMData;
SELECT MAX(timestamp) FROM DataIntegrationLogs;
SELECT MIN(timestamp) FROM DataIntegrationLogs;
SELECT * FROM ThirdPartyApplications WHERE app_name LIKE 'A%'
SELECT app_id, app_name FROM ThirdPartyApplications WHERE LENGTH(app_name) > 10
SELECT DISTINCT app_name FROM ThirdPartyApplications ORDER BY app_name DESC
SELECT * FROM ThirdPartyApplications WHERE app_description IS NULL
SELECT * FROM CRMData WHERE data_value LIKE '%important%'
SELECT * FROM CRMData WHERE data_field = 'email' AND timestamp > '2021-01-01'
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(*) FROM CRMData GROUP BY customer_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 3
SELECT * FROM CRMData WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31'
SELECT * FROM DataIntegrationLogs WHERE status = 'failed' AND error_message IS NOT NULL
SELECT log_id, integration_type, timestamp FROM DataIntegrationLogs ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT app_name, app_description FROM ThirdPartyApplications WHERE app_name IN ('App1', 'App2', 'App3')
SELECT CRMData.customer_id, AVG(LENGTH(data_value)) AS average_data_length FROM CRMData GROUP BY CRMData.customer_id
SELECT * FROM ThirdPartyApplications JOIN CRMData ON ThirdPartyApplications.app_id = CRMData.customer_id
SELECT * FROM ThirdPartyApplications INNER JOIN DataIntegrationLogs ON ThirdPartyApplications.app_id = DataIntegrationLogs.log_id
SELECT t.app_name, c.data_field FROM ThirdPartyApplications t LEFT JOIN CRMData c ON t.app_id = c.customer_id
SELECT t.app_name, d.timestamp FROM ThirdPartyApplications t RIGHT JOIN DataIntegrationLogs d ON t.app_id = d.log_id
SELECT DISTINCT app_id, app_name FROM ThirdPartyApplications
SELECT * FROM ThirdPartyApplications LIMIT 5 OFFSET 10
SELECT * FROM ThirdPartyApplications WHERE app_name LIKE '%app%' ORDER BY app_name ASC
SELECT * FROM ThirdPartyApplications;
SELECT app_name FROM ThirdPartyApplications;
SELECT app_name, app_description FROM ThirdPartyApplications;
SELECT * FROM CRMSystem;
SELECT crm_name FROM CRMSystem;
SELECT crm_name, crm_address FROM CRMSystem;
SELECT * FROM IntegrationLogs;
SELECT app_id, crm_id FROM IntegrationLogs;
SELECT log_id, sync_status FROM IntegrationLogs;
SELECT * FROM DataMappings;
SELECT app_id, crm_id FROM DataMappings;
SELECT mapping_id, mapping_details FROM DataMappings;
SELECT app_name, crm_name FROM ThirdPartyApplications JOIN CRMSystem ON ThirdPartyApplications.app_id = CRMSystem.crm_id;
SELECT app_id, app_name, sync_date FROM ThirdPartyApplications JOIN IntegrationLogs ON ThirdPartyApplications.app_id = IntegrationLogs.app_id;
SELECT crm_name, sync_status FROM CRMSystem JOIN IntegrationLogs ON CRMSystem.crm_id = IntegrationLogs.crm_id;
SELECT app_id, crm_name FROM IntegrationLogs JOIN CRMSystem ON IntegrationLogs.crm_id = CRMSystem.crm_id;
SELECT log_id, mapping_id FROM IntegrationLogs JOIN DataMappings ON IntegrationLogs.app_id = DataMappings.app_id;
SELECT app_name, crm_id FROM ThirdPartyApplications JOIN DataMappings ON ThirdPartyApplications.app_id = DataMappings.app_id;
SELECT crm_id, mapping_id FROM DataMappings JOIN CRMSystem ON DataMappings.crm_id = CRMSystem.crm_id;
SELECT app_name, crm_address, sync_date FROM ThirdPartyApplications JOIN IntegrationLogs ON ThirdPartyApplications.app_id = IntegrationLogs.app_id;
SELECT * FROM ThirdPartyApplications;
SELECT app_id, app_name, app_description FROM ThirdPartyApplications;
SELECT * FROM CRMSystem WHERE crm_address IS NOT NULL;
SELECT crm_id, crm_name FROM CRMSystem WHERE crm_name LIKE 'C%';
SELECT * FROM IntegrationLogs WHERE sync_status = 'Pending';

SELECT app_name, crm_name, sync_date FROM ThirdPartyApplications JOIN IntegrationLogs ON ThirdPartyApplications.app_id = IntegrationLogs.app_id JOIN CRMSystem ON CRMSystem.crm_id = IntegrationLogs.crm_id;
SELECT mapping_id, app_name, crm_name FROM DataMappings JOIN ThirdPartyApplications ON DataMappings.app_id = ThirdPartyApplications.app_id JOIN CRMSystem ON DataMappings.crm_id = CRMSystem.crm_id;
SELECT DISTINCT app_name FROM DataMappings JOIN ThirdPartyApplications ON DataMappings.app_id = ThirdPartyApplications.app_id;
SELECT * FROM IntegrationLogs WHERE sync_status = 'Completed' AND sync_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_logs FROM IntegrationLogs;
SELECT app_name, COUNT(log_id) AS total_logs FROM ThirdPartyApplications JOIN IntegrationLogs ON ThirdPartyApplications.app_id = IntegrationLogs.app_id GROUP BY app_name;
SELECT app_name, AVG(sync_date) AS avg_sync_date FROM ThirdPartyApplications JOIN IntegrationLogs ON ThirdPartyApplications.app_id = IntegrationLogs.app_id GROUP BY app_name;
SELECT * FROM IntegrationLogs ORDER BY sync_date DESC;
SELECT app_name, MAX(sync_date) AS latest_sync_date FROM ThirdPartyApplications JOIN IntegrationLogs ON ThirdPartyApplications.app_id = IntegrationLogs.app_id GROUP BY app_name;
SELECT crm_name, AVG(sync_date) AS avg_sync_date FROM CRMSystem JOIN IntegrationLogs ON CRMSystem.crm_id = IntegrationLogs.crm_id GROUP BY crm_name;

SELECT app_name, crm_name, mapping_details -> 'field_name' AS mapped_field FROM DataMappings JOIN ThirdPartyApplications ON DataMappings.app_id = ThirdPartyApplications.app_id JOIN CRMSystem ON DataMappings.crm_id = CRMSystem.crm_id;

SELECT app_name, crm_name, sync_date FROM IntegrationLogs JOIN ThirdPartyApplications ON IntegrationLogs.app_id = ThirdPartyApplications.app_id JOIN CRMSystem ON IntegrationLogs.crm_id = CRMSystem.crm_id WHERE sync_status = 'Pending';

SELECT app_name, crm_name, count(*) AS total_sync_logs FROM IntegrationLogs JOIN ThirdPartyApplications ON IntegrationLogs.app_id = ThirdPartyApplications.app_id JOIN CRMSystem ON IntegrationLogs.crm_id = CRMSystem.crm_id GROUP BY app_name, crm_name;
SELECT DISTINCT app_name FROM ThirdPartyApplications UNION SELECT DISTINCT crm_name FROM CRMSystem;

SELECT app_name, crm_name, mapping_details FROM DataMappings JOIN ThirdPartyApplications ON DataMappings.app_id = ThirdPartyApplications.app_id JOIN CRMSystem ON DataMappings.crm_id = CRMSystem.crm_id WHERE mapping_details -> 'active' = 'true';
SELECT * FROM crm_applications;
SELECT id, app_name FROM crm_applications;
SELECT app_name, app_description FROM crm_applications;
SELECT * FROM crm_connections;
SELECT id, connection_id FROM crm_connections;
SELECT connection_id, connection_type FROM crm_connections;
SELECT * FROM crm_data_sync;
SELECT id, connection_id, sync_status FROM crm_data_sync;
SELECT data_table, sync_status FROM crm_data_sync;
SELECT * FROM crm_sync_logs;
SELECT sync_id, log_message FROM crm_sync_logs;
SELECT log_message, log_timestamp FROM crm_sync_logs;
SELECT * FROM crm_sync_errors;
SELECT sync_id, error_message FROM crm_sync_errors;
SELECT error_message, error_timestamp FROM crm_sync_errors;
SELECT app_name, app_description FROM crm_applications WHERE id = 1;
SELECT connection_id, connection_type FROM crm_connections WHERE id = 1;
SELECT data_table, sync_status FROM crm_data_sync WHERE id = 1;
SELECT log_message, log_timestamp FROM crm_sync_logs WHERE sync_id = 1;
SELECT error_message, error_timestamp FROM crm_sync_errors WHERE sync_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM crm_applications;
SELECT app_name, app_description FROM crm_applications WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM crm_connections WHERE connection_type = 'API';
SELECT connection_id, last_sync FROM crm_connections WHERE last_sync > '2022-01-01';
SELECT c.id, c.connection_id, s.sync_status FROM crm_connections c JOIN crm_data_sync s ON c.id = s.connection_id;
SELECT * FROM crm_data_sync WHERE sync_status = true AND sync_timestamp > '2022-01-01';
SELECT s.id, s.sync_id, l.log_message FROM crm_sync_logs l JOIN crm_data_sync s ON l.sync_id = s.id;
SELECT s.id, s.sync_id, e.error_message FROM crm_sync_errors e JOIN crm_data_sync s ON e.sync_id = s.id;
SELECT a.app_name, c.connection_id, d.data_table FROM crm_applications a JOIN crm_connections c ON a.id = c.id JOIN crm_data_sync d ON c.id = d.connection_id;
SELECT * FROM crm_applications WHERE id IN (SELECT id FROM crm_data_sync WHERE sync_status = false);
SELECT id, app_name, app_description FROM crm_applications UNION SELECT id, connection_id, connection_type FROM crm_connections;
SELECT * FROM crm_applications ORDER BY app_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM crm_connections ORDER BY last_sync DESC;
SELECT a.app_name, c.connection_id, d.sync_status FROM crm_applications a LEFT JOIN crm_connections c ON a.id = c.id LEFT JOIN crm_data_sync d ON c.id = d.connection_id;
SELECT app_name, app_description FROM crm_applications WHERE app_name LIKE '%CRM%' AND app_description IS NOT NULL;
SELECT AVG(EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM (sync_timestamp - last_sync))) AS avg_sync_time FROM crm_data_sync;
SELECT id, connection_id, FIRST_VALUE(sync_status) OVER (ORDER BY sync_timestamp DESC) AS latest_sync_status FROM crm_data_sync;
SELECT app_name, COUNT(*) AS total_sync_errors FROM crm_applications a JOIN crm_data_sync d ON a.id = d.connection_id JOIN crm_sync_errors e ON d.sync_id = e.sync_id;
SELECT c.connection_id, COUNT(*) AS total_sync_logs FROM crm_connections c JOIN crm_sync_logs l ON c.id = l.sync_id GROUP BY c.connection_id;
SELECT connection_id, COUNT(*) AS total_errors FROM crm_sync_errors GROUP BY connection_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
